class SyntheticConfig[source]

SyntheticConfig(verbouse=False, warn=True) :: ConfigBase

Config for Synthetic Experiment. See https://arampacha.github.io/reformer_fastai/experiment.synthetic-task.html for details

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
synt_config = SyntheticConfig(n_hashes=8, seed=1, foo=1, verbouse=True)
synt_config

Setting n_hashes = 8
Setting seed = 1
Parameter foo is not accepted by LSHLM. Skipped

LSHLM config 
--------------------
vocab_sz        128
d_model         256
n_layers        1
n_heads         4
d_ff            256
attn_dropout    0.0
ff_dropout      0.0
emb_dropout     0.0
tie_weights     True
causal          True
pos_enc         absolute
max_seq_len     1024
axial_shape     None
axial_emb_dims  None
pad_idx         None
prenorm         False
attn_bias       False
bucket_size     64
use_lsh         True
n_hashes        8
seed            1
{% endraw %}

class TransformerLMConfigEnwik8[source]

TransformerLMConfigEnwik8(verbouse=False, warn=True) :: ConfigBase
